inclusion.criterion: Fetal Life tocometer applied and secured
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient asked to cough for synchronization
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Maternal or fetal status requires position change
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: CTU staff documents patient's age, parity, gestational age and BMI
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient completes brief survey on monitor comfort
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Fetal Life device sanitized and new belt attached
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of alcohol use. She has acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis with enlarged common bile duct and intrahepatic duct confirming gall stone pancreatitis.
